description: T1 Horse Chestnut rear of building remove the large diameter deadwood T3 Mixed Species group rear of building reduce the overhanging branches back to the boundary fence (up to 2.5m reduction). T4 Elm rear of building remove dead tree T6 Goat Willow left side of building coppice up to 3x stems to provide clearance of building and driveway. T7 mixed group rear of building (car park) remove lower branches of the Lime in group to 3m height and cut back all other vegetation to provide clearance of driveway/ parking area. Remove dead stems as needed For general maintenanceÂ

site_name: Busy Bees Nursery, Whipps Cross University Hospital Whipps Cross Road, Leytonstone, London, E11 1NR
